mapper.sql: ID, LINETYPE, LINEID, LICENSEPLATEINT, CARRIER, MODELS, DRIVER, TELEPHONE, TON, REMARKS, OPERATORID, OPERATIONUNITID, OPERATIONTIME
mapper.insert: insert into BOS.BAS_SHUTTLEBUS (ID, LINETYPE, LINEID, LICENSEPLATEINT, CARRIER, MODELS, DRIVER, TELEPHONE, TON, REMARKS, OPERATORID, OPERATIONUNITID, OPERATIONTIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{linetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lineid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{licenseplateint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carrier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{models,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ton,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{operationunitid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{operationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into BOS.BAS_SHUTTLEBUS
ID,
LINETYPE,
LINEID,
LICENSEPLATEINT,
CARRIER,
MODELS,
DRIVER,
TELEPHONE,
TON,
REMARKS,
OPERATORID,
OPERATIONUNITID,
OPERATIONTIME,

mapper.update:
update BOS.BAS_SHUTTLEBUS
LINETYPE = #{linetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LINEID = #{lineid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LICENSEPLATEINT = #{licenseplateint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARRIER = #{carrier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODELS = #{models,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRIVER = #{driver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TON = #{ton,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATORID = #{operatorid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OPERATIONUNITID = #{operationunitid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OPERATIONTIME = #{operationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update BOS.BAS_SHUTTLEBUS set LINETYPE = #{linetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LINEID = #{lineid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LICENSEPLATEINT = #{licenseplateint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARRIER = #{carrier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODELS = #{models,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRIVER = #{driver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TON = #{ton,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATORID = #{operatorid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPERATIONUNITID = #{operationunitid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPERATIONTIME = #{operationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select * from(select rownum rn, b.*,e.empname,u.name,l.linename from BAS_SHUTTLEBUS b inner join SY_EMP e on b.operatorid=e.id inner join SY_UNITS u on b.operationunitid=u.id inner join LOG_Logistics l on b.lineid=l.id) where rn between #{page} and #{rows}

select COUNT(*) from(select rownum rn, b.*,e.empname,u.name,l.linename from BAS_SHUTTLEBUS b inner join SY_EMP e on b.operatorid=e.id inner join SY_UNITS u on b.operationunitid=u.id inner join LOG_Logistics l on b.lineid=l.id)
